title: The Glimmering Ruin
trigger_condition: Player enters an abandoned industrial zone at night
description: A faint, rhythmic blue glow pulses from a collapsed factory building. Strange, harmonic humming echoes through the rusted structures, and the air smells of ozone and decay. Scavenger birds circle overhead but refuse to land near the source.

choices.consequence: Discover a functional pre-collapse energy core. Gain +2 Energy Cells but risk radiation exposure (-15% health if failed protection check)

choices.option: Scavenge the perimeter for useful materials
choices.consequence: Find abandoned toolboxes and wiring. Gain +1 Scrap Parts and +1 Electronics without danger

choices.option: Mark the location and leave immediately
choices.consequence: Avoid all risks. Gain +1 Map Data for future exploration

choices.option: Attempt to sabotage the phenomenon from a distance
choices.consequence: Cause an energy backlash. 50% chance to destroy the source (gaining nothing) or cause a chain reaction that reveals hidden loot (+3 Rare Components)
